data.message: Love this feature. But can you fix your album UI - it SUCKS. Doesn't make it easy to reorder. Especially when you have a wedding album with 100+ photos that everytime you upload it reorders the photos. It is a TERRIBLE user experience.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Crystal! We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience. Let us know what we can do to improve yours: http://bit.ly/2gvN8DW. Have a great day! -Caitlin
I want from you that you verify my facebook account,ok???
Hey Ismail! You can learn more about the process for verifying Pages here: http://bit.ly/2gGnLLV. Please keep in mind that not all Pages are currently eligible for verification. Thanks! -Caitlin
Facebook  have sent so many messages threw helpcenter and Messengers, But Nobody answer me.
